chat.msg: Welcome!
HELLO
Hello! I'm the navigator. How can I assist you today?
WHAT DO I DO NOW
To start off, please let me know your current location or describe what you see on the map. That way, I can provide you with the appropriate directions.
do i start at the x or checkmark
You start at the X. Is there anything around the X that you can see on the map?
yea its on a map on an island on the top right to the left a tiger and under it a moth
Thank you for the description. From the X on the map, you should head left towards the island with the tiger on it. Once you reach the tiger, please let me know.
how do i move
To move left, you can simply say "Move left" or "Go left" and I will update your position on the map accordingly.
move left
Great! You have moved left. Now you should be on the island with the tiger. What do you see on the map now?
i see an island with a parakeet to the left and the same moth to the right

I see. So, you are currently on the island with the tiger. To proceed, you will need to head south-west. This means moving diagonally towards the bottom left of the map. Let me know once you have moved in that direction.
move south west
Perfect! You have successfully moved south-west. Now, you should be on a bigger island with a parrot sitting on a tree. What do you see on the map now?
bottom right is a from top left is a spider left is a giraffe and below is a gator

Thank you for the description. So, you are on the big island with the parrot. To continue, you need to head south-east. This means moving diagonally towards the bottom right of the map. Let me know once you have moved in that direction.
move south east
Great! You have successfully moved south-east. Now, you should see three rocks leading to a new island. On that island, there should be a frog. Can you confirm if you see the frog on the map?
yes i see it
Perfect! Now, from the frog's island, you need to head left. This means moving towards the west direction. Let me know once you have moved in that direction.
head left
Great! You have moved left. Now, you should see a crocodile. Can you confirm if you see the crocodile on the map?
i see it
Wonderful! From the crocodile's location, you should continue heading left. This will take you back to the big island where the parrot is. Let me know once you have moved in that direction.
head left

Excellent! You have successfully moved left. Now, you should be back on the big island with the parrot. 

From here, you need to head west. Can you confirm if you see a giraffe on the map?
yes
Great! You're doing well. From the giraffe's location, you should now move south-east. Can you confirm if you see a snake on the map in that direction?
i see it
Fantastic! You're getting closer. From the snake's location, you should now move two steps east. Can you confirm if you see a treasure on the map in that direction?
yes i see it

Congratulations! You have reached the treasure! *Finished*

Well done on navigating through the map and finding the treasure. If you have any other instructions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, please let me know.

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to navigate the map?
yes

Great! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. I will guide you step by step. First, I want you to take a few steps to the left (west). Can you describe what you see?
i am at the edge of the bench slightly in the water
Good job! Now, from the edge of the bench, I want you to make a u-turn to the left and cross the trail back towards the white dog. Can you describe what you see on your way back?
i am two steps before the log
Perfect! Now, I want you to cross over the wooden branch and continue heading south. Can you describe what you see after crossing the branch?
i see a dog south and a picnic basket to its left
Good observation! Now, I want you to go over the picnic mat, touch the bowl of berries, and continue to the west. Can you give me a detailed description of what you see along the way?
i see two bushes

Great job! Now, just ahead, there is another wooden branch that crosses the river. I want you to cross over it, this time heading to the north. Can you describe what you see on the other side of the branch?
i see a bush to the right a bridge to the left and ahead is a flower stand

Well done! Now, instead of going straight to the flower stand, I want you to avoid touching the green bush and circle around it from the right side. Then continue until you reach the flower stand. Can you describe what you see when you arrive at the flower stand?
i am on a flower pot infront of the stand i see the table north west is a sunflower past that is the bridge with two peope riding a tandem bike

Excellent! Now that you are at the flower stand, turn left (west) and go below the stand. As you continue, you will reach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass the bridge to the west. Can you describe what you see after crossing the bridge?
north is a cabbege stand southe is and old couple

Great! Just past the bridge, you will see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Now, I want you to move a few steps to the south, between the old people and another wooden branch. What do you see next to the branch?
i see a deer
Fantastic! You are almost there. Now, I want you to go east, between the wooden branch and the green bush. Take a few steps in that direction. Can you describe what you see as you move east?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello

Hello! I'm the navigator. How can I assist you today?
Please describe the path you would like me to take on the map to reach the final destination.
okay you are starting on the tent on the top of the map

Got it! I am starting at the tent on the top of the map. 
Just to confirm, should I head south from the tent as my first move?
yes head south and go between the rocks and the bushes and go around the do onto the road

Great! I will head south from the tent, going between the rocks and the bushes. Then, I will circle around the dog and proceed onto the road. 
Just to clarify, is the road the blue path that leads to the south?
yes its that one now go down the road and go between the dog and the fire to go north and go around the fire between the bush going towards the left of the shroom

Understood! I will continue down the road, passing between the dog and the fire. Then, I will head north and go around the fire, going between the bush and the fire. From there, I will move towards the left of the mushroom. 

Just to confirm, am I moving towards the left of the red mushroom?
yes just going around the fire just make sure not to touch the fire the bush or the mushroom

Got it! I will make sure to stay clear of the fire, bush, and mushroom as I navigate around them. Thank you for the reminder.

Now, am I continuing to move towards the left of the red mushroom?
you and going to move under the mushroom towards the car staying on the top side of the path and turn around before you touch the car and follow the trail south

I understand. I will move underneath the mushroom while staying on the top side of the path. I will make sure to turn around before touching the car. After that, I will follow the trail south.

Just to clarify, am I following the trail south after turning around before reaching the car?
yes

Thank you for confirming. I will continue to follow the trail south after turning around before reaching the car.

Am I following the trail south without any deviations?
go south until you reach the telescope without touching it go around the telescope between the bush and follow the trail west

Got it! I will continue heading south until I reach the telescope, making sure not to touch it. Then, I will go around the telescope, going between the bush and the telescope. After that, I will follow the trail to the west.

Just to confirm, am I following the trail west after going around the telescope?
yes

Thank you for the confirmation. I will continue following the trail west after going around the telescope.

Am I following the trail without any other turns or deviations?
go until you reach the rocks and follow the trail under them to go to the cabin

Got it! I will continue following the trail west until I reach the rocks. Once I reach the rocks, I will follow the trail under them to reach the cabin.

Am I going under the rocks to reach the cabin?
yes but just the main rocks leading off from the road until you reach the cabin

Understood! I will follow the main rocks that lead off from the road until I reach the cabin.

Am I following the main rocks until I reach the cabin without deviating from the path?
yes

Great! I will stay on the main rocks and continue following them until I reach the cabin.

**Finished** 

I have successfully reached the cabin. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to navigate through the map together?
where do i go
Great! Let's start. Look around you and describe what you see near the palm trees.
three palm trees and a dog south
Fantastic! You're on the right track. Now, I want you to go under the first palm tree and then turn right. Can you do that?
i went a bit too far left now what

No worries! Let's get back on track. Go back towards the palm trees and make sure you're standing under the first one. From there, turn right and cross the second palm tree. Let me know when you've done that.
do i go under or over the second palm tree
Apologies for the confusion. You need to go under the second palm tree. So, please go under it and then let me know when you're done.
i am under the second palm tree
Perfect! Now, continue to move forward. After the second palm tree, make a sharp left turn before reaching the third palm tree. Let me know when you've made the turn.
so i go north west and turn west at the palm tree

No, I apologize for the confusion. After the second palm tree, you need to make a sharp left turn, not northwest. This means you should turn towards the left and continue moving in a southward direction. Let me know once you've made the left turn.
i am under the second palm
Apologies for the confusion. Please move south from the second palm tree, making a sharp turn to the left before reaching the third palm tree. Let me know once you've made the turn.
now what
Great job! Now, as you continue southward, you should notice a brown puppy nearby. Move slightly to the left, then turn right. Let me know when you've done that.
i dont understand

I apologize for any confusion. From where you made the left turn, continue straight ahead. You should see a brown puppy ahead of you. Once you reach the brown puppy, move slightly to the left, and then turn right. Let me know if you need any further clarification.
i am past the dog under the third palm tree
Perfect! You're doing great. Now, you should see a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right. You need to walk between them to reach the water. Can you see the rocks?
yes i am at the water

Fantastic! You've reached the water. Now, please step into the water and face towards the west. You should see a large red crab. Once you spot the crab, turn right (west) and start walking along the big rock. Let me know when you've turned and started walking along the rock.
i have done so

Great job! Now, as you continue westwards along the big rock, you will encounter a medium-sized rock. Keep moving along the big rock until you reach the medium rock. Let me know once you've reached it.
okay
Excellent! Now, as you face the medium rock, you might notice a shark in the water. To avoid the shark, make a sharp right turn away from the water. Let me know when you've made the turn.
okay

Awesome! Now, after making the sharp right turn, you should be back on land. Look for a blue-yellow-white ball nearby. Walk between the ball and the medium-sized rock, and continue heading north. Let me know when you've passed between the ball and the rock.
i have done so

Great work! Now, as you continue heading north, you'll notice a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Keep going, but make a slight left turn and go towards the north-west, crossing between the red tent and the larger speaker. Let me know when you've done that.
okay

Well done! Now, imagine you're circling around the red tent in an arc. Once you complete the arc, continue heading south, but don't go all the way to the water. Instead, when you reach the shore, make a right turn (west) and go below a red kayak. Let me know when you're below the kayak.
i am there

Perfect! Now, make a 90-degree right turn, so you're facing north. Follow along the side of the red kayak and keep going until you reach a small green bush. This is your final objective. Let me know when you've reached the small green bush.
